summary: This is an email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers to defense attorneys Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Mennin regarding the upcoming jury selection in the case United States v. Maxwell. It attaches a list of prospective jurors who will return for peremptory strikes on November 29, 2021, and notes that the jury department will not excuse remaining jurors until the jury is sworn in.

events.title: Peremptory Strike Exercise for Jury Selection
events.description: The date scheduled for the exercise of peremptory strikes in the jury selection process for United States v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers to defense counsel regarding jury selection in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial (US v. Maxwell, docket 20cr330).
It provides a list of prospective jurors who will return for peremptory strikes on November 29, 2021.
The jury department is taking the precaution of not excusing any remaining jurors from service until the jury is formally sworn in.
The document highlights the active jury selection phase of the Maxwell trial in late November 2021.
